pr_title: MLT - Avoid sending only base stacktrace

timeline.message: Split ScopeStackCollector part into abstract class

Avoid adding MLT data if only base stacktrace provided

Also increase span priority to avoid being discarded.
Allow stack iteration from both leaf and root.

Use sampling priority as a signal to increase chance of MLT activation.

Also increase heuristic sampling rate limiter.

timeline.author: randomanderson

replies.bodyText: I considered that, and I wanted to avoid a null check... but I just realized that wouldn't be needed.  I'll change it back.
replies.author: tylerbenson

timeline.message:
Use sampling priority as a signal to increase chance of MLT activation.

Also increase heuristic sampling rate limiter.

Use sampling priority as a signal to increase chance of MLT activation.

Also increase heuristic sampling rate limiter.

It actually does need a null check.

And reduce code coverage requirement.
